2. PffBB-n / PC71BM (materials or compounds)

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, "PffBB-n / PC71BM" and "PSCs", do not directly refer to the value of a material property, but rather to the materials or devices that are being studied. Therefore, they are not relevant to the task of identifying property values.
